sentences.sContent: Malia and Sasha may live in the White Housethese days, but Michelle and I still make sure they finish their schoolwork, dotheir chores, and walk the dog.
sentences.sCn: 我的两个女儿这些日子住在白宫，但是米歇尔和我仍然要督促她们完成家庭作业和做一些力所能及的家务，同时还要负责遛狗。

sentences.sContent: She's worn shorts before — to walk the dog, do stuff around the White House.
sentences.sCn: 以前在遛狗或白宫附近工作时，她也穿短裤。
